Author: hocng015
Name: Tsunippy
Punchline: Next-gen animation lock compensation with adaptive RTT estimation.
Description: Reduces the effects of lag on animation locks, weaving, and cast actions. Features Jacobson/Karels RTT estimation, dynamic latency floor, cast lock prediction, context-aware lock database, and real-time diagnostics. An improved successor to NoClippy.
Changelog: Initial release with 6 improvements over NoClippy: Jacobson/Karels RTT, dynamic floor, cast lock prediction, context-aware DB, graduated packet weight, diagnostics overlay.
